column5: Going to give The Soapy Pond a go this Saturday and was just wondering if anyone has been out there lately. Any ice reports would be greatly appreciated.
If the cooch is fishable... St. John will be as well.
Yep, Couch had 8 plus inches on Saturday and the weather has been good all week. Can't see why St. John shouldn't be good as well.
Bringing the sled so I just wanted to make sure. Appreciate the info.

Was out two weekends ago. Brought the atv out with me. about 8 inches at that point. lots of bikes and sleds out.  Had some rain and really cold temps since so not sure what it is now. When i was up cooch had the sled trail staked which i believe they dont do until the is 10" all the way across. I got 8 pike that weekend the biggest being 6lbs. But fishing was pretty slow Good luck
